title: Work Management Center Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Norfolk State (Norfolk, VA) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: I applied for the position on 9/08/22, waited, and received a email for an interview on 10/19/22. The facilities team I interviewed with was great and very professional. They were upfront and answered any questions I had about the position. I was sent an email from HR with a job offer on 12/19/22, which I gladly accepted.
Interview Questions: - What kind of experience do you have using CMMS? - Using a scale of 1 through 5, how would you rate your proficiency using Microsoft Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint? - Do you have experience with handling confidential information? If so, how would you handle someone outside of our organization asking about that information?

title: Professor Interview
Interview Descriptions: Applied for the position, waited, and was contacted for an interview. The interview was conducted online (prior to pandemic). References were called post-interview. Then, there was no further news until I received an email stating I didn’t get the position. I don’t believe any hire was made for the position.

title: Financial Aid Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Norfolk State in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Employer is very knowledgeable, kind, and professional. I thoroughly enjoyed their attention to detail and keeping the culture of an HBCU at the forefront. Be prepared to discuss experience in financial aid systems and processes.
Interview Questions: Name a time where you have a difficult situation and how you resolved it.

title: Program Managing Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Norfolk State (Hampton, VA)
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed online by a panel of 3 members from NSU.  It lasted around one hour. Questions were mostly about my background and experience related to the position.  At the end I was given time to ask them if I had any questions about the role.
Interview Questions: What do you know about this position?

title: Graduate Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Norfolk State (Norfolk, VA) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was smooth, the committee was awesome and friendly. I was a bit nervy at first but I settled in pretty quickly. At the end I liked the interviewers and  I've had very good and extremely awesome experience in Norfolk State.
Interview Questions: Describe the working principle of a mosfet

title: Presidential Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Norfolk State (Norfolk, VA) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: It was a very easy process I was asked a series of questions in the office of the president. I was interviewed individually in the managers office. He was very stern and picky, yet I was able to be comfortable and express my qualifications.
Interview Questions:
Computer knowledge
problem solving
multi tasking

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Norfolk State (Syracuse, NY) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very smooth and fast enough. easy rounds with focus on research and previous work related questions. In depth knowledge of projects was required. Took 10 days for the complete process from start to end

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Norfolk State
Interview Descriptions: It was a comfortable experience. Interviewer was very nice. I was offered the job by phone the next day. I was given a short campus tour & told a short history on the school along with their goals.
Interview Questions: What do you bring to an office environment?

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Norfolk State (Norfolk, VA) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: Online interview and phone conversation. Called in the phone and asked general questions about resume, asked about strengths and weakness, how strong in computer simulation and thin film skills, electron microscopy skills.
Interview Questions: Why are you Interested? Why do you like NSU? Previous background?

title: Research Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Norfolk State
Interview Descriptions: Very easy and simple. Good to get through
Interview Questions: There was no question in the program

title: IT Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Norfolk State (Norfolk, VA) in Oct 2010
Interview Descriptions: The position was posted on the goverment jobs board and started to apply... then noticed by HR to come on campus to take the interview. 3 to 1, talked about working experience, qualifications, tech questions included basic OS, network, database...
